Text.Page: You mastered your temper, discovering an inner strength you never knew you had.

They call you a hero, ask you to save the world again and again...
but they treat you like a servant, a pawn for tasks they can't be bothered with?

Those weaklings could solve their own problems, but why risk themselves, when they can risk you?

So they trap you on a path of endless service, always finding something else to keep you busy.

Don't they know that they are insects beneath your feet? It would do them good to solve their own problems once in a while...
